# Random Graph Generation with *lucy*

```{r, message=FALSE}
#devtools::install_github("osazuwa223/lucy")
library(lucy)
library(bnlearn)
```

The generation of graphs in igraph does not provide many options.  The following functions generate highly connected DAGs.

```{r, message=FALSE}
g <- generateMultiConnectedDAG(10)
igraphVizPlot(g)
```

```{r}
g <- layerDAGs(3, 4)
igraphVizPlot(g)
```

```{r}
g <- layerDAGs(6, 3)
igraphVizPlot(g)
```
